articles.title: U.S. labor market recovery on track as weekly jobless claims approach 18-month low - Reuters
articles.description: The number of Americans filing new claims for jobless benefits fell to the lowest level in nearly 18 months last week, offering more evidence that job growth was being hindered by labor shortages rather than cooling demand for workers.
articles.content: WASHINGTON, Sept 9 (Reuters) - The number of Americans filing new claims for jobless benefits fell to the lowest level in nearly 18 months last week, offering more evidence that job growth was being … [+5791 chars]

articles.title: Taliban interim government agrees to let foreigners leave Afghanistan - CNA
articles.description: Two hundred foreigners in Afghanistan, Americans among them, are set to depart on charter flights from Kabul on Thursday (Sep 9) after the new Taliban government agreed to their evacuation,
articles.content:
The Taliban were pressed to allow the departures by US Special Representative Zalmay Khalilzad, the US official said, speaking to Reuters on condition of anonymity.
